text: Ten minutes in and Kazakhstan are 2-0 up against Scotland. It's going to have to be Twickenham tactics for the  second half.

text: Lost in the mix but @sajidjavid Home Office announced a big increase in funding for places of worship security in England and Wales this week. Don't know if Barnett applies:

text: That was an unworthy and a deeply cynical “anti-politics” message from a prime minister who manoeuvres every national  decision around her divided party.

text: The real Donald @eucopresident has spoken - Even if hope seems frail and if fatigue is visible and justified we cannot give up the search for a solution..
author: Torcuil

text: Torcuil a variant of Torcall, and probably a half vocative. Torcall/Torcuil the name and "a Thorcuill" when calling to the person. Experts please correct me but I think I'm caught halfway. Every Mhairi and Hamish out there will know the feeling
author: Torcuil

text: In the chamber @IanBlackfordMP demands that the House meets on Saturday to plan the way ahead

text: The biggest constitutional crisis this country has seen - “when will she grow a backbone , weak, weak, weak” says @PeteWishart . PM takes it in her stride & updates commons on Brexit short extension request sent today.

 Cailean - 12 Colin - 6,

 Murdo -14  Myles- 46,
 and Torcall- 1 Theo - 177.

text: That’s a great result , I’m a Jonah on pub quiz teams, confidently insisting on the “right” answer and constantly proved wrong.

text:
Sorry, not Barvas moor, that long gone. One scheme closer to Stornoway and the other Eishkin
https://lwp.scot/about/
author: Torcuil

text: Interconnector news - Ofgem have greenlit the 600MW cable from Shetland but recommends a smaller 450MW for Western Isles link, on cost grounds.  Could affect viability of the big Lewis Windpower project for Barvas moor and won't futureproof for offshore or new community schemes.
author: Torcuil

text: “Strong and longstanding convention” dating back to 1604. I mean that's just a year after the Union of Crowns, a fully century before the Act of Union and, oh, we notice just eleven days before we leave the EU.
author: Torcuil

text: Downing St scramble for wiki entry...
author: Torcuil

text: The Commons just now
author: Torcuil

text: "What the government cannot do is submit the same proposition again..." - Speaker hasfired a warning shot to May not to risk his ruling by putting the unchanged deal to the House again.
author: Torcuil

text: Get on with it...
author: Torcuil

text: The reality of poverty at DWP questions - a few weeks ago @BrendanOHaraSNP tells of a family with new born baby turning up at his office "in crisis, penniless, father had not eaten in three days, they been refused healthy start vouchers because they had ticked the wrong box".
author: Torcuil

text: earlier @joannaccherry raises case of mum waiting five weeks for universal credit and further month for child care costs. Nurseries have to be paid in advance, why can’t system accept that, she asks? @AmberRuddHR says system has been reformed to address this.
author: Torcuil

text: DWP questions @HannahB4LiviMP raises case of a vulnerable 60yr constituent with severe learning difficulties  who has been placed in the work related activity group and faces a humiliating fitness for work assessment.
author: Torcuil

text: Nation shall speak peace unto nation
author: Torcuil

text: Isn't it a wider western phenomenon? There was a suggestion that ban on leaded petrol led to a reduction in violent crime, sounds batcrazy but...
author: Torcuil

text: And if the DUP come aboard with May then about two dozen Labour MPs probably hold more sway over Brexit than the DUP and the Scottish parliament
author: Torcuil

text: "I'd like to see more reassurances from the attorney general. I will not vote for something that puts the constitutional integrity of the UK at risk," says  @RossThomson_MP ."If these concerns are addressed (about NI) then we have to suck up a lot of other stuff we don't like"
author: Torcuil

text: We will never see a game like that again, historymakers both sides.
author: Torcuil
